entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 03:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -13.9°C
Wind: NW 37 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 18.
